item.title: Fix Macbook Pro Unstable Bluetooth
item.description: Solved problems with bluetooth audio crackling, cutting out and disconnecting, on MacBook Pro by running this: sudo defaults write /Library/Preferences/com.apple.airport.bt.plist bluetoothCoexMgmt Hybrid
